            // Social Media Interactions 
            $('div.socialmedia a').each(function (index) {
                $(this).click(function () {
                    alert($(this).children(":first").attr('alt'));
                    s.prop9 = $(this).children(":first").attr('alt');
                    socialInteraction('visit', $(this).children(":first").attr('alt'));
                });
            });
            // Social Media Interactions - Share Specific
            $('div#shareThisItem a.socialMedia').each(function (index) {
                $(this).click(function () {
                    socialInteraction('share', $(this).attr('id'));
                });
            });

            // Where To Buy - track online outets item clicks (for the link not the image)
            $('div.outletDiv a.jsLink').each(function (index) {
                $(this).click(function (e) {
                    setWTBEvent('onlinepartner', $(this).html());
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
